name: Harriston Heights
daytime_inside_message: Ample sunlight streams through openings in the building around you.
daytime_outside_message: The sun shines down brightly all around you.
nighttime_inside_message: The room around you is dimly lit. Shadows obscure your vision.
nighttime_outside_message: The weak moon is mostly covered by thick clouds. The little light that pokes through is fleeting at best.
